verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O my soul; <S%H5315><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> that is within <S%H7130><s%> me, [bless] His holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%>
Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O my soul, <S%H5315><s%> And forget <S%H7911><s%> none <S%H408><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of His benefits; <S%H1576><s%>
Who pardons <S%H5545><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your iniquities; <S%H5771><s%> Who heals <S%H7495><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your diseases; <S%H8463><s%>
Who redeems <S%H1350><s%> your life <S%H9132><s%> from the pit; <S%H7845><s%> Who crowns <S%H5849><s%> you with lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and compassion; <S%H7356><s%>
Who satisfies <S%H7646><s%> your years <S%H5716><s%> with good <S%H9185><s%> things, <S%H9185><s%> [So that] your youth <S%H5271><s%> is renewed <S%H2318><s%> like the eagle. <S%H5404><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> performs <S%H6213><s%> righteous <S%H6666><s%> deeds, <S%H6666><s%> And judgments <S%H4941><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> who are oppressed. <S%H6231><s%>
He made <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> His ways <S%H1870><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> His acts <S%H5949><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is compassionate <S%H7349><s%> and gracious, <S%H2587><s%> Slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%> and abounding <S%H7227><s%> in lovingkindness. <S%H2617><s%>
He will not always <S%H5331><s%> strive <S%H7378><s%> [with us]; Nor <S%H3808><s%> will He keep <S%H5201><s%> [His anger] forever. <S%H5769><s%>
He has not dealt <S%H6213><s%> with us according to our sins, <S%H2399><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> rewarded <S%H1580><s%> us according to our iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>

For as high <S%H1361><s%> as the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are above <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> So great <S%H1396><s%> is His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Him.
As far <S%H7368><s%> as the east <S%H4217><s%> is from the west, <S%H4628><s%> So far <S%H7368><s%> has He removed <S%H7368><s%> our transgressions <S%H6588><s%> from us.
Just as a father has <S%H1><s%> compassion <S%H7355><s%> on [his] children, <S%H7355><s%> So the Lord <S%H1121><s%> has <S%H3068><s%> compassion <S%H7355><s%> on those who fear <S%H7355><s%> Him.
For He Himself <S%H1931><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> our frame; <S%H3336><s%> He is mindful <S%H2142><s%> that we are [but] dust. <S%H6083><s%>
As for man, <S%H582><s%> his days <S%H3117><s%> are like grass; <S%H2682><s%> As a flower <S%H6731><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> he flourishes. <S%H6692><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> has passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> it, it is no <S%H369><s%> more; <S%H369><s%> And its place <S%H4725><s%> acknowledges <S%H5234><s%> it no <S%H3808><s%> longer. <S%H5750><s%>

But the lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> to everlasting <S%H5769><s%> on those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Him, And His righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to children <S%H1121><s%>'s children,
To those who keep <S%H8104><s%> His covenant, <S%H1285><s%> And who remember <S%H2142><s%> His precepts <S%H6490><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has established <S%H3559><s%> His throne <S%H3678><s%> in the heavens; <S%H8064><s%> And His sovereignty <S%H4438><s%> rules <S%H4910><s%> over all. <S%H3605><s%>

Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> you His angels, <S%H4397><s%> Mighty <S%H1368><s%> in strength, <S%H3581><s%> who perform <S%H6213><s%> His word, <S%H1697><s%> Obeying <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of His word! <S%H1697><s%>
Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you His hosts, <S%H6635><s%> You who serve <S%H8334><s%> Him, doing <S%H6213><s%> His will. <S%H7522><s%>

Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you works <S%H4639><s%> of His, In all <S%H3605><s%> places <S%H4725><s%> of His dominion; <S%H4475><s%> Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O my soul! <S%H5315><s%>
